CustomField.description: The approximate length of time the Apex Job ran for.
CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT ( tc9_pr__Status__c ) = 'Failed', IF(ISBLANK (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c ), TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( ( LastModifiedDate - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( IF((ROUND( MOD( (LastModifiedDate - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )) >= 0, (ROUND( MOD( (LastModifiedDate - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )), 0)) & " minutes", TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( IF((ROUND( MOD( (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )) >= 0, (ROUND( MOD( (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )), 0)) & " minutes" ), IF(ISBLANK (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c), TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( ( NOW() - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( IF((ROUND( MOD( (NOW() - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )) >= 0, (ROUND( MOD( (NOW() - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )), 0) ) & " minutes (processing...)", TEXT( FLOOR( MOD( (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24, 24 ) ) ) & " hours " & TEXT( IF((ROUND( MOD( (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )) >= 0, (ROUND( MOD( (tc9_pr__Completed_Date_Time__c - tc9_pr__Start_DateTime__c ) * 24 * 60, 60 ), 0 )), 0)) & " minutes" ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The approximate length of time the Apex Job ran for.
CustomField.label: Process Duration
